main event: A witness reported seeing a bright, elliptical, luminous object with a pulsating light over Covington, Kentucky on July 7, 1967.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be 50 yards in diameter and hovered for 10 minutes at an altitude of approximately 700 feet.
The object then accelerated and disappeared in a northern direction.
No photographs or physical evidence were submitted.
The report was considered reliable by the investigator.
Other witnesses in the area did not report seeing the object.
sighted object: bright, elliptical, luminous object with a pulsating light
